apps.name: recordtodaydid(记录今天做了)v1.00
apps.version_info:
RecordTodayDid is a free app that helps you remember what you've done recently and remember future planned tasks. With a simple click, you can mark the process of drinking water, taking medicine, washing your hands, pooping, meeting, etc
记录今天做了(RecordTodayDid)是免费app,帮助你记忆最近做了的事情,并想起将来的计划任务.你只要简单点一下就可以标记刚才喝水,吃药,洗手,大便,会议等过程

apps.name: mybatteryok(我的电池OK)v2.15.3
apps.version_info:
Free app that displays battery usage information and can set alarms for battery percentage, temperature, and charging and discharging power to remind you to use the battery correctly
免费app,用于显示电池使用情况信息,并可以设置电量百分比,温度,充放电功率的报警来提醒你正确使用电池

apps.name: topwisdom(最高智慧)v1.0
apps.version_info:
Free app(Simplified Chinese only), including 20 mini games, and finally genuine videos
免费app(仅简体中文)，包括20个小游戏,最后还有正品视频。

apps.name: app and soft discuss forum(应用和软件论坛)
apps.version_info:
Application and software discussion forum, feedback and suggestions
应用和软件讨论论坛，反馈意见和建议
